					var isAdParent = slotParentElement.classList.contains('js-ad-slot-parent');

					var isResizeable = slotParentElement.classList.contains('js-resizeable-ad-slot');

					if (scripts[i].dataset.src != null) {
						scripts[i].src = scripts[i].dataset.src;

			function loadScripts() {
				window.requestIdleCallback

			}
			if (document.readyState === "complete"
				|| document.readyState === "loaded"
